name: Southwest Airlines Co.
summary: Southwest Airlines Co. is a major U.S. airline headquartered in Dallas, Texas, operating the world's largest all-Boeing 737 fleet and serving over 100 destinations in the U.S., Puerto Rico, Mexico, Central America, and the Caribbean. Known for its low-cost fares and customer-centric policies, Southwest is the fourth-largest airline in North America by passengers carried. The company has a long history of profitability and innovation in the airline industry.
